attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you fed up of your local council spending what seems forever to complete road work in multiple areas and hate getting caught up in all those jams from one to the next?

Are you one where you would prefer your local council to put all their work force to fixing *one-area-at-a-time* to heavily reduce congestion?

If yes, then add your name to this petition to send to Mr Brown.
